actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to eliminate the special treatment provided under the credit for the elderly to individuals who have public retirement system income and who have not attained age 65.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the special tax treatment provided under the credit for the elderly to individuals who have public retirement system income and who have not attained age 65.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to eliminate the special treatment provided under the credit for the elderly to individuals who have public retirement system income and who have not attained age 65.
